DOC.brief_summary: To determine acute chronic effect short course treatment spinal cord injure ( SCI ) individual either anticholinergic agent ( tiotropium ) β₂ agonist ( Salmeterol ) : - Fraction expire NO ( FeNO ) - Selected Biomarkers inflammation exhale breath condensate ( EBC ) - Pulmonary function , measure pulmonary function test body plethysmography
DOC.brief_title: Effects Anticholinergic Long-Acting Beta 2 Agonist FeNO Pulmonary Function SCI
DOC.criteria: 1 . Chronic Spinal Cord Injury ( > 1 year postinjury ) 2 . All American Spinal Injury Association ( ASIA ) classification 3 . Stable tetraplegia ( level injury C3C8 , nonventilator dependent ) 4 . Age 1865 year 1 . Smoking , active history smoking within last 6 month ; 2 . Active respiratory disease ; 3 . Known history asthma lifetime recent ( within 3 month ) respiratory infection ; 4 . Use medication know affect respiratory system ; 5 . Use medication know alter airway caliber ; 6 . Coronary heart and/or artery disease ; 7 . Hypertension ; 8 . Adrenal insufficiency ; 9 . Pregnancy ; 10 . Severe Milk Protein Allergy ; 11 . Lack mental capacity give inform consent ; 12 . Previous allergic reaction hypersensitivity salmeterol tiotropium ; 13 . Individuals take medication ( ) know /potential drug interaction suggest therapy modification concomitant use salmeterol tiotropium : ( 1 ) selective alpha/beta blocker : carvedilol , labetalol ; ( 2 ) nonselective betablockers : Carteolol ; Levobunolol ; Metipranolol ; Nadolol ; Penbutolol ; Pindolol ; Propranolol ; Sotalol ; Timolol ) ; ( 3 ) CYP3A4 Inhibitors : ( e.g , Atazanavir ; Clarithromycin ; Conivaptan ; Darunavir ; Delavirdine ; Fosamprenavir ; Imatinib ; Indinavir ; Isoniazid ; Itraconazole ; Ketoconazole ; Lopinavir ; Nefazodone ; Nelfinavir ; NiCARdipine ; Posaconazole ; QuiNIDine ; Ritonavir ; Saquinavir ; Telithromycin ; Voriconazole ; ( 4 ) Iobenguane I 123 / Sympathomimetics : Albuterol ; Aminophylline ; Arformoterol ; Armodafinil ; Benzphetamine ; Caffeine ; Dexmethylphenidate ; Dextroamphetamine ; Diethylpropion ; Dipivefrin ; DOBUTamine ; DOPamine ; Doxapram ; Dyphylline ; EPHEDrine ; EPINEPHrine ; Fenoterol ; Formoterol ; Isometheptene ; Levalbuterol ; Levonordefrin ; Lisdexamfetamine ; Metaproterenol ; Methamphetamine ; Methylphenidate ; Midodrine ; Modafinil ; Naphazoline ; Norepinephrine ; Oxymetazoline ; Phendimetrazine ; Phentermine ; Phenylephrine ; Pirbuterol ; Propylhexedrine ; Pseudoephedrine ; Sibutramine ; Terbutaline ; Theophylline ; Xylometazoline .
